dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the lakes of Afghanistan from the United States Defense Mapping Agency (USDMA) 1:100,000 scale topo maps. This layer includes both major and minor lakes. Lakes is a base map layer of polygon lakes features mapped at a 1:100,000 scale. Data at this scale is suitable for general studies and local planning. Afghanistan Information Management Service. (2005) Lakes: Afghanistan, 1990-2004. Afghanistan Information Management Service. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/bz034mx8779
